name: Virtual Pet Defender
description:
Defend your virtual pet from the slimes!

Virtual Pet Defender is a cross between a virtual pet and a tower defence game! Build towers to defend your friend, but be careful, because each type of tower is linked to one of your pet's vital stats! The more towers you build, the quicker the stats deplete!

Keep your pet in The Zone by keeping your pet's stats high enough in order to strengthen your towers! Be careful, because if The Zone meter drops all the way to zero, the game is over!

Virtual Pet Defender was made in 17 days for the Virtual Pet Jam hosted by Team Dogpit.
